name: Torii (Torii Games)
description:
A bubble bursts,

- Why didn’t you?

There’s this man sitting in the corner.

Waiting,   

breathing.

Heavy, burning thoughts.

Worries.

- Are you ready for this?

Am I?

A clock is shouting: 

Release me.

Torii is an introspective journey about feelings. Join Ipa and Moswig on an unusual adventure. Ipa will have to overcome her greatest fears and fight guilt to find her little sister.  An adventure / puzzle game with an artistic approach, filled with surreal landscapes, strange creatures, and human-developed emotions. ► Features

♦  Explore surreal landscapes with Ipa and Moswig searching for memories in order to save little Lulu.

♦  Discover the secrets behind this peculiar story with a different and poetic narrative format. 

♦ Use your ability to see hidden objects, and thus solve various puzzles. 

♦ Walk alongside Moswig, your "spirit / backpack" companion, and discover why you should carry it. 

♦ The god Khilar has put you to the test! Collect all Moswig's wings to improve your skills and reach the end of the adventure. 

♦ Enjoy an incredible and original soundtrack composed by Adriano Martino.

► Who?
  • Joaquín A. Castro - Developer.
  • Adriano Martino - Music.
  • Pablo Hollmann - Additional art.
  • Heather D' Angelo - Voice acting.
► Requirements
  • SO: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Procesador: Intel core i5-3570k - AMD fx 6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 3gb or Radeon RX 560
  • Widescreen support!
  • Language: English.

Thanks for supporting indie games, indie stories, and indie devs!
